Articles.Content:
I have two strategies active:

Unpaid research, converting 50% of reputation to science

Outsourced R&D, converting 51% of funds to science.

However, when I look at the active contracts I'm seeing 104% of my income being diverted.  Where is it going???

And it also looks like all the reputation gain is being diverted, although I'm not sure into what.

For the 6 tourists I'm looking at it appears I will get 6 science and lose a little bit of money, not counting the cost of the rocket itself.  My intent was to divert half the gains other than science into science, not all of them!
Yeah, it's a known bug. It seems to be true that each strategy is getting applied twice.

19 hours ago, bewing said:

Yeah, it's a known bug. It seems to be true that each strategy is getting applied twice.

 

Followup--it's only a reporting bug.  My bank account is going up, not down.
